name: Merge Fighting Games
description:
Merge your heroes to go into battle and get the biggest hero on the block with the aim of merging all the super to have enough power to fight against the enemies?

Your quest is simple but not easy. You need use your tactic and your brain to combine the super or warriors and fight against the enemies! You need quickly synthesize your heroes into giant hero if you want to win!
developers: Kolorlife Automatic Technology Joint Stock Company
publishers: Kolorlife Automatic Technology Joint Stock Company
